chapters.title: Chapter 4: Offers
chapters.info: Roedran Almaric do Arreloa a'Naloy, p. 128 (240)—King of Murandy, at least in name. In reality, Murandians hold allegiance to lords only, and those lords often refuse to pay their taxes to the King. He hopes to make himself the first true king of Murandy in its history. In the paperback edition, Roedran's name is replaced by Ailron's name at this point in the book, so it would appear that this is a misprint.
